args.text: Deepswap.ai is an online AI face swap app that allows users to generate faceswap videos, photos, and GIFs. The app also includes features such as a movie role-play video generator, one-second face swap photo editor, and a meme and GIF maker. Deepswap.ai is web-based and data-safe, with no installation, ads, or watermark. The app has over 150 million users and has been positively reviewed by over 5000 users. Deepswap.ai offers a premium version with a 50% discount.
